org.red5.server.net.remoting.message

Class RemotingCall

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.red5.server.service.Call
      • org.red5.server.service.PendingCall
        • org.red5.server.net.remoting.message.RemotingCall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, IPendingServiceCall, IServiceCall

    public class RemotingCall
extends PendingCall
    Remoting method call, specific pending call.
    Author:
    The Red5 Project (red5@osflash.org), Luke Hubbard, Codegent Ltd (luke@codegent.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • RemotingCall

        public RemotingCall()

      • RemotingCall

        public RemotingCall(String serviceName,
            String serviceMethod,
            Object[] args,
            String callback,
            boolean isAMF3,
            boolean isMessaging)
        Create remoting call from service name, method name, list of arguments and callback name.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - Service name
        serviceMethod - Service method name
        args - Parameters passed to method
        callback - Name of client callback
        isAMF3 - Does the client support AMF3?
        isMessaging - Is this a Flex messaging request?
